summary: Syntax script for MHEG-5 DTB (and UK Profile)
name: mheg
description:
Simple highlighter for MHEG - complete enough for general use. 
Feel free to add missing keywords / features!

For feedback / questions, please use: http://paulbanks.org/projects/mhegvim/

Paul

versions.release_notes: Added string handling for " as well as '
